---
layout: beepboxpost
title: "A Day in the Merchantile City"
date: 2023-07-01
author: "Swapnil Patel"
categories: d&d_campaign_1
ordering: 4
background: |
  A vibrant port town city-state co-existing amidst the major countries of Dalmasca and Baron. Capitalizing on its strategic location, it often acts as a hub of commerce on the continent, and helps connect it to the merchants of Valence to the south. It's home to The Academy, a school of magic that rivals the Obelisk of the Macalanian Archipelago. Under the parliament, an extensive spy network coerces the world to secure Heles' future for generations to come. Outside the city borders lies calm forests and serene rolling hills, dotted with the occasional beasts and caverns. Roads to the city are oft filled with merchants setting out on expeditions or returning with their hauls.
thematicElements:
  - name: "Upbeat and vibrant"
    desc: |
      Heles is a land of commerce, always bustling with the latest wares from locals, neighbours and faraway lands. With merchants and travellers arriving from all corners, itâ€™s a vibrant metropolitan city where creed and colour are secondary to goods and services.
  - name: "A swaying rhythm"
    desc: |
      With the busiest parts of the city right on the waterfront, the sea plays a major role in the success of the city-state. The ebbs and flows of the waves herald new opportunities for cultural and commercial exchange.
  - name: "Light hearted and Grand"
    desc: |
      Heles is a land of opportunity where anyone can get a fresh start. Pull yourself up by the bootstraps and start grinding, because you too can make it here.
---

### Round 2

- Tweaked the 8-bar rhythm to be consistent across the whole song
- Extended the melody line a bit more
- Toned down the rhythm a bit
- Added more slides

### Initial Sketch

[**Listen or Edit with Beepbox**](https://jummbus.bitbucket.io/#j5N07Unnamedn410s1k0l00e07t1ba7g0bj0fr3O_____)

- The alternating rhythm creates a lively vibe, to invoke the merchant areas
  - It also adds some ebb and flow, as if we're on a boat
- Most of the instruments are percussion to keep things moving and bouncy
- The vibraphone helps fill the volume gap left behind by the percussion instruments
- Claps also add to the upbeat dance vibe. As if passerbys are clapping along to the beat
- The vibraphone starts off with long notes, and sounds like the bells of a clock tower. 

#### Rhythm

Every 8 bars has a repeating rhythm, switching between 3-3-2 and 2-2-2-2 rhythms

```
3  3  2  | 3  3  2  | 2 2 2 2  | 2 2 2 2  | 3  3  2  | 2 2 2 2  | 3  3  2  | 2 2 2 2  | 
```
